main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 30 January 1955 in Murrieta, California, involving an aluminum-colored object moving slowly.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 15 minutes,The reported object moved toward the east,The UFO appeared solid with no change in its appearance throughout the sighting,Comments from witnesses and the 27th Air Division suggested the object was likely a balloon,This sighting was part of the Project Blue Book investigation into UFO phenomena.
sighted object: an aluminum-colored object in the sky
witness description: Civilian account with no specified witness details
